24 void resetController(Communication* com)
25 {
26  std::string cmd = "Reset Controller";
27  Parameter::ParameterMap input;
28  Parameter::ParameterMap output;
29  try
30  {
31  com->sendCommand(cmd, input, output);
32  }
33  catch (std::exception& e)
34  {
35  ROS_WARN_STREAM(
36  "An error occured during initial Reset!\n Description: " << e.what());
37  }
38 }
39 
40 void shutdownSignalHandler(int sig)
41 {
42  if(rstOnShutdown){
43  resetController(com_ptr);
44  ros::Duration(0.1).sleep();
45  }
46  try
47  {
48  com_ptr->stopCommunication();
49  com_ptr->disconnect();
50  }
51  catch (std::exception& e)
52  {
53  ROS_WARN_STREAM("An error occured while trying to shut down the "
54  "connection.\n Description: "
55  << e.what());
56  }
57  ros::shutdown();
58 }
59 
60 void registerSensorGroups(Communication* com)
61 {
62  // register sensor groups
63  try
64  {
65  if (!com->registerSensorGroups("Set Group"))
66  ROS_WARN_STREAM("Registering all sensor groups failed!");
67  }
68  catch (std::exception& e)
69  {
70  ROS_WARN_STREAM("An error occured while trying to register sensor "
71  "groups!\n Description: "
72  << e.what());
73  }
74 }
75 
76 void activateMotorController(Communication* com)
77 {
78  bool was_set = false;
79  Parameter::ParameterMap input;
80  Parameter::ParameterMap output;
81  std::string cmd = "Drive Forward";
82  short level = 0;
83  input.insertParameter("speed", "int16_t", level);
84  try
85  {
86  was_set = com->sendCommand(cmd, input, output);
87  if (!was_set)
88  ROS_WARN_STREAM("Activating motor controller failed!");
89  }
90  catch (std::exception& e)
91  {
92  ROS_WARN_STREAM("An error occured while trying to activate the motor "
93  "controller!\n Description: "
94  << e.what());
95  }
96 }
97 
98 void activateSteeringController(Communication* com)
99 {
100  bool was_set = false;
101  Parameter::ParameterMap input;
102  Parameter::ParameterMap output;
103  std::string cmd = "Set Steering Level";
104  short level = 0;
105  input.insertParameter("steering", "int16_t", level);
106  try
107  {
108  was_set = com->sendCommand(cmd, input, output);
109  if (!was_set)
110  ROS_WARN_STREAM("Activating steering controller failed!");
111  }
112  catch (std::exception& e)
113  {
114  ROS_WARN_STREAM("An error occured while trying to activate the steering "
115  "controller!\n Description: "
116  << e.what());
117  }
118 }

180 // sensor group callbacks
181 void publishSensorGroupMessage1(
182  SensorGroup* grp, std::unordered_map<std::string, ros::Publisher*>& pub)
183 {
184  sensor_msgs::Range usl, usr, usf;
185  double l, r, f;
186  ros::Time t = ros::Time::now();
187  try
188  {
189  grp->getChannelValueConverted("USL", l);
190  grp->getChannelValueConverted("USF", f);
191  grp->getChannelValueConverted("USR", r);
192  usl.range = l;
193  usf.range = f;
194  usr.range = r;
195 
196  usl.max_range = 3;
197  usl.min_range = 0.06;
198  usl.field_of_view = 0.76;
199  usl.radiation_type = 0;
200  usl.header.frame_id = "left_sensor";
201  usl.header.stamp = t;
202 
203  usf.max_range = 3;
204  usf.min_range = 0.06;
205  usf.field_of_view = 0.76;
206  usf.radiation_type = 0;
207  usf.header.frame_id = "front_sensor";
208  usf.header.stamp = t;
209 
210  usr.max_range = 3;
211  usr.min_range = 0.06;
212  usr.field_of_view = 0.76;
213  usr.radiation_type = 0;
214  usr.header.frame_id = "right_sensor";
215  usr.header.stamp = t;
216 
217  pub["USL"]->publish(usl);
218  pub["USF"]->publish(usf);
219  pub["USR"]->publish(usr);
220  }
221  catch (std::exception& e)
222  {
223  ROS_WARN_STREAM("An error in Message 'Sensor grp1' occured!\n Description: "
224  << e.what());
225  }
226 }
227 
228 void publishSensorGroupMessage2(
229  SensorGroup* grp, std::unordered_map<std::string, ros::Publisher*>& pub)
230 {
231  sensor_msgs::Imu imu;
232  ros::Time t = ros::Time::now();
233  try
234  {
235  grp->getChannelValueConverted("GX", imu.angular_velocity.x);
236  grp->getChannelValueConverted("GY", imu.angular_velocity.y);
237  grp->getChannelValueConverted("GZ", imu.angular_velocity.z);
238  grp->getChannelValueConverted("AX", imu.linear_acceleration.x);
239  grp->getChannelValueConverted("AY", imu.linear_acceleration.y);
240  grp->getChannelValueConverted("AZ", imu.linear_acceleration.z);
241  imu.header.stamp = t;
242  imu.header.frame_id = "robot_imu";
243 
244  pub["IMU"]->publish(imu);
245  }
246  catch (std::exception& e)
247  {
248  ROS_WARN_STREAM("An error in Message 'Sensor grp2' occured!\n Description: "
249  << e.what());
250  }
251 }
252 
253 void publishSensorGroupMessage3(
254  SensorGroup* grp, std::unordered_map<std::string, ros::Publisher*>& pub)
255 {
256  std_msgs::UInt8 hallcnt;
257  std_msgs::Float64 halldt, halldt8;
258  try
259  {
260  grp->getChannelValue("HALL_CNT", hallcnt.data);
261  grp->getChannelValueConverted("HALL_DT", halldt.data);
262  pub["HALL_CNT"]->publish(hallcnt);
263  pub["HALL_DT"]->publish(halldt);
264  }
265  catch (std::exception& e)
266  {
267  ROS_WARN_STREAM("An error in Message 'Sensor grp3' occured!\n Description: "
268  << e.what());
269  }
270 }
271 
272 void publishSensorGroupMessage4(
273  SensorGroup* grp, std::unordered_map<std::string, ros::Publisher*>& pub)
274 {
275  sensor_msgs::MagneticField mag;
276  //short mx, my, mz;
277  ros::Time t = ros::Time::now();
278  try
279  {
280  grp->getChannelValueConverted("MX", mag.magnetic_field.x);
281  grp->getChannelValueConverted("MY", mag.magnetic_field.y);
282  grp->getChannelValueConverted("MZ", mag.magnetic_field.z);
283  mag.header.stamp = t;
284  mag.header.frame_id = "robot_magnetometer";
285  pub["MAG"]->publish(mag);
286  }
287  catch (std::exception& e)
288  {
289  ROS_WARN_STREAM("An error in Message 'Sensor grp4' occured!\n Description: "
290  << e.what());
291  }
292 }
293 
294 void publishSensorGroupMessage5(
295  SensorGroup* grp, std::unordered_map<std::string, ros::Publisher*>& pub)
296 {
297  sensor_msgs::BatteryState batVD, batVS;
298  double vsbat, vdbat;
299  ros::Time t = ros::Time::now();
300  try
301  {
302  grp->getChannelValueConverted("VDBAT", vdbat);
303  grp->getChannelValueConverted("VSBAT", vsbat);
304  batVD.voltage = vdbat;
305  batVS.voltage = vsbat;
306  batVD.header.stamp = t;
307  batVS.header.stamp = t;
308 
309  pub["VDBAT"]->publish(batVD);
310  pub["VSBAT"]->publish(batVS);
311  }
312  catch (std::exception& e)
313  {
314  ROS_WARN_STREAM("An error in Message 'Sensor grp5' occured!\n Description: "
315  << e.what());
316  }
317 }

341 }

343 void textCallback(

349 void publishDebugMessage(
350  const std::string& msg, ros::Publisher* pub)
351 {
352  std_msgs::String debug;
353  debug.data = msg;
354  pub->publish(debug);

356 
357 // ros command message callbacks
358 void motorLevelCallback(std_msgs::Int16::ConstPtr motorLevel, Communication* com){
359  bool was_set = false;
360  std::string cmd = "Drive Forward";
361  short level = motorLevel->data;
362  if (level < 0)
363  {
364  cmd = "Drive Backward";
365  level = -level;
366  }
367  Parameter::ParameterMap input;
368  Parameter::ParameterMap output;
369  input.insertParameter("speed", "int16_t", level);
370  try{
371  was_set = com->sendCommand(cmd, input, output);
372  }catch(std::exception& e){
373  ROS_WARN_STREAM("An error in Message 'set_motor_level_msg' occured!\n Description: "<<e.what());
374  was_set = false;
375  }
376  if(!was_set) ROS_WARN_STREAM("Motor level set to: "<<motorLevel->data<<" failed!");
377 }
378 
379 void steeringLevelCallback(std_msgs::Int16::ConstPtr steeringLevel, Communication* com){
380  bool was_set = false;
381  std::string cmd = "Set Steering Level";
382  Parameter::ParameterMap input;
383  Parameter::ParameterMap output;
384  input.insertParameter("steering", "int16_t", steeringLevel->data);
385  try{
386  was_set = com->sendCommand(cmd, input, output);
387  }catch(std::exception& e){
388  ROS_WARN_STREAM("An error in Message 'set_steering_level_msg' occured!\n Description: "<<e.what());
389  was_set = false;
390  }
391  if(!was_set) ROS_WARN_STREAM("Steering level set to: "<<steeringLevel->data<<" failed!");
392 }

394 // debug raw message callback
395 void ucBoardMessageCallback(std_msgs::String::ConstPtr msg, Communication* com){
396  try{
397  com->sendRawMessage(msg->data);
398  }catch(std::exception& e){
399  ROS_WARN_STREAM("An error in Message 'send_uc_board_msg' occured!\n Description: "<<e.what());
400  }
401 }
402 }
